00001 /*
00002  * pool.c
00003  *
00004  *  Created on: 2009-04-24
00005  *      Author: Jean-Lou Dupont
00006  *
00007  * Handles pooling / recycling of ``envelopes``
00008  *
00009  *  FOR MORE INFORMATION, CONSULT   ``pool.h``
00010  *
00011  *
00012  * NOTE: This module assumes it is executing in a thread-safe environment.
00013  * ----
00014  *
00015  */
00016 
00017 #include <string.h>
00018 #include <stdlib.h>
00019 
00020 #include "litm.h"
00021 #include "pool.h"
00022 #include "logger.h"
00023 
00024         // PRIVATE //
00025         // ======= //
00026         litm_envelope * _stack[LITM_POOL_SIZE];   //LIFO stack
00027 
00028         int _top_stack = 0;
00029         int _created   = 0;
00030         int _recycled  = 0;
00031         int _returned  = 0;
00032 
00033 
00034         void
00035 __litm_pool_recycle( litm_envelope *envlp ) {
00036 
00037         //can we recycle this one?
00038         if ( _top_stack + 1 == LITM_POOL_SIZE ) {
00039                 __litm_pool_destroy( envlp );
00040                 return;
00041         }
00042 
00043         _stack[_top_stack++] = envlp;
00044 
00045         // statistics
00046         _recycled ++;
00047 
00048 }//
00049 
00050 
00051 
00052 
00053         litm_envelope *
00054 __litm_pool_get(void) {
00055 
00056         litm_envelope *e;
00057 
00058         // do we have a spare?
00059         e = _stack[ _top_stack ];
00060         if (NULL!=e) {
00061 
00062                 _stack[_top_stack] = NULL;
00063                 __litm_pool_clean( e );
00064 
00065                 // statistics...
00066                 _returned ++;
00067 
00068                 if (0!=_top_stack)
00069                         _top_stack-- ;
00070 
00071         } else {
00072 
00073                 // prepare a new one
00074                 e = malloc(sizeof(litm_envelope));
00075                 if (NULL!=e) {
00076                         bzero(e, sizeof(litm_envelope));
00077 
00078                         // statistics...
00079                         _created ++ ;
00080                 }
00081 
00082         }
00083 
00084         return e;
00085 }//
00086 
00087 
00088         void
00089 __litm_pool_destroy( litm_envelope *envlp ) {
00090         DEBUG_LOG_PTR( envlp, LOG_ERR, "__litm_pool_destroy: NULL");
00091 
00092         // First, destroy the message
00093         free( envlp-> msg );
00094         free( envlp );
00095 
00096 }//
00097 
00098 
00099 
00100         void
00101 __litm_pool_clean( litm_envelope *envlp ) {
00102         DEBUG_LOG_PTR( envlp, LOG_ERR, "__litm_pool_clean: NULL");
00103 
00104         // clear routing information
00105         bzero( (char *) &envlp->routes, sizeof(__litm_routing) );
00106 
00107 }//
